channel.title: Need help running a client? Then lOOk here!
channel.description:
When you use the rune-loft client, csk client, guildscape client, and dog's client do you sometimes get an error while running? them, if you don't, this tut isn't for you. Okay when you run those, you probably get an error like this.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Then try the following to fix it.
go to start button>computer>right click>properties. then click the " environmental varibles" tab. then go to the system varibles. If you do not have a varble called "classpath" click new and for the varible name type classpath and for value type [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\lib\ext\QTJava.zip.[/code]
then go to the box above the system varibles box and find a varble called "CLASSPATH." Then enter this for the value. [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
if you do not have the varble called "CLASSPATH" click new button then enter "CLASSPATH" for the varble and this for the value. [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%; [/code] Pm me any errors.

item.title: Need help running a client? Then lOOk here!
item.dc:creator: @Turk017 Turk017
item.description:
@Turk017 wrote:

[quote=“psyhoman, post:4, topic:179263”][quote author=WH1T3 B0W link=topic=240401.msg2039385#msg2039385 date=1202500890]
all these problems are solved in individual tuts but nicely done, this needs sticky.
[/quote]
why it should need sticky ? :![/quote]

I agree. This shouldn’t really need to be stickied. Maybe if there were more explaining then yeah

Like: change the 02/03 part to whatever jdk version you have blablabla…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help running a client? Then lOOk here!
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

This isn’t the only way.

@echo off
color 09
title Compiling...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
title Running...
echo Client started!
JAVA -Xmx500m -cp . Gui
pause

Compiler + runner in one pls.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help running a client? Then lOOk here!
